frontmatter.title: Improving gVisor Memory Subsystem Performance
frontmatter.excerpt: In this project, we analyzed the performance of the gVisor memory management subsystem, starting from benchmarking malloc and ending up focusing on MMAP. We further profiled MMAP performance within gVisor and identified its bottlenecks. We proposed an optimization in the free page searching algorithm of virtual memory space within gVisor (from O(N) to O(logN)). This optimization patch has been merged into production.
